titles.title: To amend the nondiscrimination provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to protect older, longer service participants.
To amend the nondiscrimination provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to protect older, longer service participants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to nondiscrimination requirements for tax-exempt employee pension, profit-sharing, and stock bonus plans, to include protections for older, longer service participants in such plans, including the grandfathering of such participants under defined benefit plans.
